Description:

Stepping outside, there is a paved courtyard and side entertaining area ideal for Summer BBQ's. With more than enough space for a low maintenance garden, four-legged friend or the potential to expand the living areas further. This low maintenance property offers ample parking with a 2 car garage and space for an additional 2 cars inside the front picket gate. The combined garage and studio are fitted to the same exceptional quality of the home; fully plastered, insulated, LED lighting throughout and a separate set of French door leading to the rear entertainment area.

Instantaneous gas hot water with dual temperature controls
Multi-zoned security system
Studio
A must see to truly appreciate the flexibility this home offers to every buyer.
